q: spoke to the music legend about the upcoming American version of X Factor, a.k.a. the project that lured Simon Cowell and his fitted tees away from Idol, and he had this to say: X Factor is going to be a huge show. It's going to be huge, because you can have bands on there, and that's one thing I wanted to change, if I had been on American Idol, Elton John told the channel. "Get away from the solo stuff. Let's have bands, let's have writers, let's have songwriters, let's change the format a little, and that's why

thought my heart was going to jump out of my chest," said Allen Iverson , who in 31 minutes also handed out five assists and collected four rebounds. Philadelphia lost three of four games with Allen Iverson sidelined. Having Allen Iverson back helps. He's a finisher. He can get to the line and get the ball to guy at the right time. We've missed that, Elton Brand said. , I wouldn't do the show. I'm not looking for somebody who's just going to be a hit in America; I'm looking to find a global star." He continued: We called the show The X Factor because it was an expression we used a lot, which was you don't have to necessarily have the best voice, you may not be the best-looking person- but you have something which defines you as a star, like Lady Gaga . She's got The X Factor. And you never know until he walks in the room. Simon Cowell added that the record label is "committed" to making the eventual winner a star. "Whoever wins this show is going to get complete, total support from me, from Sony

been running wild that the troubled actress would be a judge on the highly anticipated talent show, since her notoriety would be good for ratings. But it seems the rumors are not true. did. Her right eye remains bandaged, but Gabrielle Giffords is opening both of them, doctors said Thursday "She took a moment to focus, you could see she was focusing," Kirsten Gillibrand said. And then Mark said... " Gabrielle Giffords , if you can see me, if you can see me, give us a thumbs-up... She didn't only give a thumbs-up, she literally raised her entire hand. But Gabrielle Giffords didn"t stop there, Kirsten Gillibrand said. She reached out and grabbed her husband "and is touching him and starts to really choke him like she was really trying to hug him."

want this to happen," Late Show host David Letterman called Live host Regis Philbin on his show Tuesday night to talk about Mr. Regis Philbin 's announcement that he is leaving Live at the end of this season. I don't want this to happen. I don't want you to leave, Mr. David Letterman said. announced Thursday that Google co-founder Larry Page will be replacing Eric Schmidt as CEO. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt tweeted of the change. Eric Schmidt has been CEO since 2001, during which time he has overseen the company's growth from a Silicon Valley search engine into a global web goliath
